tool.name: HyPhy-Conv
tool.description: translate an in-frame codon alignment to proteins
tool.command: cp '$input_file' conv_input.fa && hyphy conv '$gencodeid' '$deletions' conv_input.fa aa.fa > '$conv_log' @ERRORS@

param.name: deletions
param.label: Keep deletions
param.help: If this is checked, deletions will be left in the output file

tool.help: HyPhy-CONV: Translate an in-frame codon alignment to proteins =============================================================
